Hi there👋!, Iam Kenneth Tubio and Iam a Front end web developer!

I’m a front-end web developer who enjoys creating user-friendly web applications. I focus on building responsive designs and simple, functional interfaces that enhance the user experience.

SAMPLE PROJECTS

Explore my sample front-end web app projects, where I combine modern design with smooth user interactions. Each project highlights my skills in crafting responsive and visually engaging web experiences using the latest front-end technologies.

Landing Page

This project shows a stylish and modern landing page made to attract users and increase conversions. It is built using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS and with Javascript. The page is designed to look good on all devices.

View more

Simple Login Form

This project features a clean and simple login page designed for user authentication. Built using HTML, CSS, and Tailwind CSS, the page is responsive and works well on all devices.

View more

Calculator

Welcome, whis is my mini project as a beginner, a simple calculator built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. This project demonstrates how to create a functional and stylish calculator using modern web technologies. Enjoy you like it!
